issue.title: Notify manager when a data package is uploaded
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

It would be interesting to have an automatic notification when a data package is deposited via the front-end diffusion management page.
For now, when a user do so, there is no automatic way to inform the person in charge of processing those data.  

This notification could be an email containing : 
- package file name
- diffusion manager who uploaded the data

This email could have as recipient the extraction manager and/or the platform administrator (to discuss).

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I see this proposal as a nice enhancement.

I would also suggest to set the deposit + notification (all in one) as optional in the backend since this feature is not used by all platform. 

(I have no opinion on email recipient since I do not kno the use case - we do not use this feature)

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated.
The recipient should be the organism manager.
A specific joomla event should be raised as well. This event will not be used for now but will be available for specific user development or futur easySDI enhancement.
